Terion: This about you did speak [Raksis]? Me they call terion, I help to you. I will describe, how to traverse the labyrinth Of [bellis]. You will as soon as open this door, the enemies will attack on you. For the beginning it is necessary to kill their all and to pass beside the following room. They are ready?
